ygData.subject: Need a bind in Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello again all. I ve recently arrived in Freeport and intend on staying there for a while. However, my level 4 cleric can t yet use the spell Bind Affinity,
ygData.messageBody:
Hello again all. I've recently arrived in Freeport and intend on staying
there for a while. However, my level 4 cleric can't yet use the spell Bind
Affinity, and I'm having trouble finding someone who can (or will) bind me to
the town. If anyone is located around there and has the spell, or knows
someone who does, please drop me a line, (I'm Fenwen in game).

And for those of you who like hellish stories, here's one for you;

I make the journey from Felwithe all the way to Freeport without much
trouble. I'm wandering around the outsides of Freeport, and I see an asp. I
say, there's low-level stuff around here, it can't be that hard. Well, killed
me in three hits, needless to say. So, I get sent back to Felwithe. I make it
all the way to the docks at Kaladim, catch the boat, and I'm on my way again.
This isn't so bad, I tell myself. Wrong again. I accidentally hit the windows
key and get thrown out of EQ. I log back on, only to find myself wading in
the Ocean of Tears, miles away from my destination, with my corpse slowing
decaying. So, I says to myself, what now? Well, I decided to swim for it. I
make it from 210, 300 to about 210, -8000 (An hour swim, adding in the fact I
swam in circles for a good half hour) and I see a boat heading for me
straight on. I get a crafty idea and swim right into it - and right into the
hold! But, it's going the wrong way.. it takes me back to Kaladim! So I wait
the trip out and finally arrive in Freeport. I run all the way to where I
died, and my corpse is, amazingly, still there. I've never been so frustrated
in my life.
